name: Last.fm Paint It Black Improved (2009-10-06)
description:
Please use the new Version found here: style 29035



Gives the Paint It Black style on Last.fm some nice roundups (vertical menu and background).

Screenshot: http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/3307/screenrc.png

base64 Style here: http://nopaste.com/p/aBStSTQiU
(apparently too big for this site and I really wanted to offer a base64 due to the better load speeds).

The style used here loads the image from the web and the base64 version should be preferred, but do whatever you like.
